WRITING.TITLE: Can Southpaw get Jake Gyllenhaal an Oscar or even a nomination?

WRITING.TEXT: We've made quite a few moves improving our defense this off season, which is great, but the only problem is last year, while defense was a major concern, our offense was pretty abysmal.
